description: Exports a database to a bacpac.

database_name.description: The name of the database to be exported.

storagekey.description: The storage key to use.  If storage key type is SharedAccessKey, it must be preceded with a '?.'

administratorlogin.description: The name of the SQL administrator.

api_version.description: The API version to use for the request.

subscription_id.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

storagekeytype.description: The type of the storage key to use.

administratorloginpassword.description: The password of the SQL administrator.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

parameters.description: The required parameters for exporting a database.
